description: This roast pumpkin salad with pearl couscous and pomegranate makes for a colourful, delicious addition to the table. Serve alongside barbecued lamb, beef or chicken.
keywords: Roast Pumpkin With Pearl Couscous & Pomegranate
name: Roast Pumpkin With Pearl Couscous & Pomegranate Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pumpkin from roasting pan. Remove and discard seeds and skin. Dice flesh and add to couscous mixture. Serve topped with pomegranate arils.
